statements: SELECT * FROM patient_vitals WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, blood_pressure FROM patient_vitals WHERE temperature > 98.6;
SELECT heart_rate, blood_pressure FROM patient_vitals WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_vitals WHERE blood_pressure LIKE '%120%' ORDER BY heart_rate ASC;
SELECT patient_id, temperature FROM patient_vitals WHERE heart_rate > 80 AND temperature < 99.5;
SELECT * FROM patient_vitals WHERE heart_rate > 80 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_id, blood_pressure, temperature FROM patient_vitals WHERE temperature BETWEEN 98.6 AND 100 ORDER BY temperature ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients, AVG(heart_rate) AS average_heart_rate FROM patient_vitals GROUP BY blood_pressure HAVING total_patients > 5 ORDER BY average_heart_rate DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT blood_pressure FROM patient_vitals WHERE heart_rate < 70 OR temperature > 100 ORDER BY blood_pressure;

SELECT patient_id, MAX(heart_rate) AS max_heart_rate, MIN(temperature) AS min_temperature FROM patient_vitals WHERE blood_pressure LIKE '120/%' GROUP BY patient_id HAVING max_heart_rate > 100 ORDER BY min_temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_vitals WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate FROM patient_vitals WHERE temperature > 98.6;
SELECT * FROM sensor_logs WHERE sensor_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(value) FROM sensor_logs WHERE sensor_id = 2 GROUP BY timestamp;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) FROM sensor_logs GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 100;
SELECT * FROM patient_vitals WHERE heart_rate > 70 ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT patient_id, blood_pressure FROM patient_vitals WHERE temperature < 98.6;
SELECT patient_id, MAX(heart_rate) AS max_heart_rate FROM patient_vitals GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(value) AS avg_value FROM sensor_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2021-01-01' GROUP BY sensor_id ORDER BY avg_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_vitals pv INNER JOIN sensor_logs sl ON pv.patient_id = sl.sensor_id WHERE pv.heart_rate BETWEEN 60 AND 80 AND sl.value > 30 ORDER BY pv.patient_id ASC, sl.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM PatientVitals;
SELECT temperature, heart_rate FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_id, status FROM SensorStatus ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT timestamp, temperature FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM PatientVitals WHERE temperature > 98.6;
SELECT id, temperature, heart_rate FROM PatientVitals WHERE blood_pressure = 'Normal';
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE temperature > 98.6 AND heart_rate < 80 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, status FROM SensorStatus WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT timestamp, blood_pressure FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_id = 2 AND heart_rate > 100;
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temp, MIN(heart_rate) AS min_heart_rate FROM PatientVitals;
SELECT * FROM patient_vitals;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patient_info WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT room_type, occupancy_status FROM hospital_rooms ORDER BY room_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_type, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE value > 50;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, blood_pressure, body_temperature FROM patient_vitals WHERE heart_rate < 100;
SELECT * FROM patient_info
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patient_info ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC
SELECT * FROM patient_vitals WHERE blood_pressure > 120 AND heart_rate < 80
SELECT patient_name, body_temperature FROM patient_info JOIN patient_vitals ON patient_info.patient_id = patient_vitals.patient_id
SELECT room_id, room_type FROM hospital_rooms WHERE occupancy_status = true
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT * FROM heart_rate ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT patient_id, reading FROM blood_pressure WHERE systolic_pressure > 120;
SELECT patient_id, temperature, timestamp FROM temperature WHERE temperature > 98.6;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT heart_rate.reading, patients.name FROM heart_rate JOIN patients ON heart_rate.patient_id = patients.patient_id WHERE heart_rate.reading > 100 AND patients.gender = 'Female' ORDER BY heart_rate.timestamp DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT blood_pressure.systolic_pressure, blood_pressure.diastolic_pressure, patients.age FROM blood_pressure JOIN patients ON blood_pressure.patient_id = patients.patient_id WHERE patients.age BETWEEN 30 AND 40 ORDER BY patients.age ASC
SELECT patients.name, temperature.temperature FROM patients JOIN temperature ON patients.patient_id = temperature.patient_id WHERE temperature.temperature > 98.6 ORDER BY patients.name ASC

SELECT patients.name, oxygen_saturation.saturation_level FROM patients JOIN oxygen_saturation ON patients.patient_id = oxygen_saturation.patient_id WHERE oxygen_saturation.saturation_level < 95 ORDER BY oxygen_saturation.timestamp ASC
